value.name: New York's wealthiest residents are considering fleeing to Florida ahead of income-tax hikes in the state, according to a report
value.description: It isn't just wealthy New Yorkers who are considering a move to Florida. In February, Insider's Daniel Geiger and Alex Nicoll reported that Microsoft, Citadel, Elliott Management, and Baker McKenzie were nearing deals for prime office spaces in South Florida.
